actions.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To reduce the pay of Members of the House of Representatives if a Speaker is not elected on the first day of a Congress.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
No Pay for Disarray Act

This bill eliminates one day of pay for each Member of the House of Representatives for any day of a Congress during which no Speaker has been elected.

titles.title: To reduce the pay of Members of the House of Representatives if a Speaker is not elected on the first day of a Congress.
